item.title: Predict Breast Cancer using TensorFlow
item.description: body { text-align: justify} In this article we try to predict if a patientâ€™s diagnosis of breast tissue is malignant or bening. From the code below, using the feature_names function we can explore the name of all the predictors involved in the breast cancer such as for example: mean radius, mean perimeter and so forth. Moreover, using the funtion target_names we have the two level of the response variable (malignant, benign).
